title: Infrastructure Discovery and Dependency Mapping
description: Conduct comprehensive discovery of TargetCo infrastructure within ParentCo environment. Map all dependencies, shared services, and integration points. Document current hosting model, server inventory, storage systems, and network architecture.

title: Azure AD Tenant Migration Planning
description: Plan migration of 650+ TargetCo users from ParentCo Azure AD tenant to BuyerCo Azure AD tenant. Include application inventory, authentication dependencies, and phased migration approach.

title: Server Migration and Consolidation
description: Migrate 110-130 servers from ParentCo environment to BuyerCo Azure tenant. Includes server assessment, OS updates if needed, application dependencies, and cutover planning.

title: TSA Infrastructure Services Agreement
description: Negotiate and establish comprehensive TSA covering all infrastructure domains - hosting, compute, storage, network, identity, and security operations. Define service levels, costs, and termination timeline.

title: SaaS Application Consolidation and Migration
description: Inventory and consolidate SaaS applications between TargetCo (45 apps) and BuyerCo (60 apps). Identify overlaps, migrate users, consolidate licenses, and decommission redundant applications.

title: Network Discovery and Documentation
description: Comprehensive discovery of TargetCo network infrastructure within ParentCo environment including topology mapping, IP addressing, VLAN structure, routing protocols, and connectivity dependencies

title: IP Address Conflict Analysis and Renumbering Plan
description: Analyze IP addressing schemes of both TargetCo (ParentCo) and BuyerCo environments, identify conflicts, and develop comprehensive renumbering strategy with minimal business impact

title: WAN Circuit Planning and Procurement
description: Identify required WAN circuits for TargetCo separation, evaluate carrier options, negotiate contracts, and manage installation process with expedited timelines

title: Firewall Separation and Rule Migration
description: Extract TargetCo-specific firewall rules from ParentCo environment, implement new firewall infrastructure, migrate and test rules, establish security zones for integration

title: DNS Migration and Integration
description: Separate TargetCo DNS zones from ParentCo AD-integrated DNS, establish new DNS infrastructure, configure zone transfers, and integrate with BuyerCo DNS architecture

title: Day 1 Connectivity Bridge Implementation
description: Establish temporary network connectivity between TargetCo and BuyerCo environments to ensure business continuity during full network separation and integration process

title: Azure AD Tenant Migration and Identity Integration
description: Migrate 650 TargetCo users from ParentCo Azure AD to BuyerCo Azure AD, including user accounts, groups, service accounts (60-80), and privileged accounts (25-40). Implement SSO integration for all applications and maintain MFA coverage.

title: Security Monitoring and SIEM Integration
description: Integrate TargetCo assets (620 endpoints, 110-130 servers, 200+ log sources) into BuyerCo security monitoring. Configure Microsoft Sentinel for TargetCo environment and establish 24/7 monitoring coverage.

title: Endpoint Security Migration
description: Migrate 620 endpoints from ParentCo CrowdStrike instance to BuyerCo security stack. Maintain continuous endpoint protection during transition and update device management policies.

title: Compliance Framework Assessment and Certification
description: Assess current compliance posture, identify gaps in SOC 2 and ISO coverage, and establish compliance framework for integrated TargetCo operations. Conduct compliance gap analysis and remediation.

title: Privileged Access Management Implementation
description: Implement PAM solution for 25-40 privileged accounts and 60-80 service accounts. Establish privileged access workflows, session recording, and just-in-time access controls.

title: Security Assessment and Penetration Testing
description: Conduct comprehensive security assessment of TargetCo environment post-integration, including penetration testing, vulnerability assessment, and security posture evaluation.

title: Integration Program Management Office (PMO) Establishment
description: Establish dedicated PMO to manage complex cross-domain dependencies, coordinate work streams, manage TSA relationships, and provide executive reporting. Critical given the sequential nature of work and high complexity.

title: TSA Negotiation and Agreement Execution
description: Negotiate comprehensive Transition Services Agreement with ParentCo covering infrastructure, network, and cybersecurity services. Must include detailed service levels, governance, and minimum 18-month terms to support complex separation timeline.
